plot: When leaving a party, a boy becomes the victim of a vicious and continuous attack by a mysterious girl in a red raincoat.
title: Love Hurts
plot_es: When leaving a party, a boy becomes the victim of a vicious and continuous attack by a mysterious girl in a red raincoat.
plot_en: When leaving a party, a boy becomes the victim of a vicious and continuous attack by a mysterious girl in a red raincoat.
